summary: On September 13, 2025, multiple firings occurred as authorities sought out comments considered offensive regarding the killing of a conservative free speech advocate. title: Questions linger about alleged shooter’s motivation for killing Charlie Kirk
summary: Authorities are investigating the background and political affiliations of a suspect involved in the killing of a far-right influencer. title: The RBA wants to ban debit and credit card surcharges. Banks are fighting back
summary: Banks claim that the RBA and government are not adequately informing consumers about the true costs of recent changes, which include increased fees and diminished loyalty programs. They argue this lack of transparency could mislead customers regarding the impact of these adjustments. The banks are urging for clearer communication to ensure consumers understand the full implications of these financial alterations.
